description: Defines the 'iron-iconset-svg' custom element for managing SVG icon sets in Polymer projects, including methods for icon registration, application, removal, and cloning.

classes.name: Polymer
classes.description: Main Polymer framework object used to define custom elements.

methods.name: getIconNames
methods.description: Returns an array of all icon names in this iconset.

methods.name: applyIcon
methods.description: Applies an SVG icon to a specified element.

methods.name: removeIcon
methods.description: Removes an applied icon from an element.

methods.name: _nameChanged
methods.description: Handles updates when the iconset's name changes, registering metadata.

methods.name: _createIconMap
methods.description: Creates a map of icon IDs to SVG elements.

methods.name: _cloneIcon
methods.description: Produces a clone of the SVG icon element by ID.

methods.name: _prepareSvgClone
methods.description: Prepares and returns a clone of an SVG element with specified size.

calls: new Polymer.IronMeta({type: 'iconset', key: this.name, value: this})
